SELECT A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.DMN_ID, A.DMN_LNM, COALESCE(A.DMN_PNM,'-') AS DMN_PNM, COALESCE(A.LNM_CRI_DS,'-') AS LNM_CRI_DS, COALESCE(A.PNM_CRI_DS,'-') AS PNM_CRI_DS, A.RQST_DCD, A.RVW_CONTS , A.VRF_CD, A.VRF_RMK, A.DMNG_ID, A.DMNG_LNM, A.INFOTP_ID , B.DATA_TYPE , B.DATA_LEN , B.DATA_SCAL , A.INFOTP_LNM , A.UPP_DMN_ID, A.UPP_DMN_LNM, A.MDL_LNM, A.UPP_SUBJ_LNM, A.SUBJ_ID, A.SUBJ_LNM, A.LST_ENTY_ID, A.LST_ENTY_PNM , A.LST_ENTY_LNM, A.LST_ATTR_ID, A.LST_ATTR_PNM, A.LST_ATTR_LNM, A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD, A.CD_VAL_IVW_CD, A.DATA_FRM, A.SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN, A.CRG_USER_ID , A.CRG_USER_NM, A.DMN_ORG_DS, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID , A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID, A.FULL_PATH,A.ENC_YN,A.DUP_YN,A.DMN_DSCD ,A.DMN_ORG_TXT, A.SUB_CD_YN
, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
--, CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' END AS FontColor , CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' WHEN A.VRF_CD = '3' THEN '#FF8000' WHEN A.VRF_CD = '5' THEN '#0000FF' END AS FontColor , GET_USER_NM(A.RQST_USER_ID) AS RQST_USER_NM , V.UPP_DMNG_ID , V.UPP_DMNG_LNM , A.DMN_MIN_VAL , A.DMN_MAX_VAL , A.STND_ASRT FROM WAQ_DMN A LEFT JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE B ON B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND B.INFOTP_LNM = A.INFOTP_LNM
AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT LEFT JOIN V_WAA_DMNG V ON A.DMNG_ID = V.DMNG_ID AND V.DMNG_LVL > 0 WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY A.RQST_SNO

SELECT A.* ,G.UPP_DMNG_ID ,G.UPP_DMNG_LNM FROM WAQ_DMN A LEFT OUTER JOIN V_WAA_DMNG G ON A.DMNG_LNM = G.DMNG_LNM WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
SELECT DMN_ID FROM WAQ_DMN WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 1

INSERT INTO WAQ_DMN (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM, LNM_CRI_DS, RQST_DCD, DMNG_ID, DMNG_LNM , INFOTP_ID, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, INFOTP_LNM, UPP_DMN_ID, UPP_DMN_LNM , SUBJ_ID, LST_ENTY_ID, LST_ENTY_PNM, LST_ENTY_LNM, CD_VAL_TYP_CD, CD_VAL_IVW_CD , DATA_FRM, SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN, CRG_USER_ID, DMN_ORG_DS, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS,ENC_YN,DUP_YN,DMN_DSCD,DMN_ORG_TXT,SUB_CD_YN, STND_ASRT ) SELECT #{reqmst.rqstNo} , (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) FROM WAQ_DMN WHERE RQST_NO = #{reqmst.rqstNo}) + (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) , A.DMN_ID, A.DMN_LNM, A.DMN_PNM, A.LNM_CRI_DS, 'CU', A.DMNG_ID, B.DMNG_LNM , A.INFOTP_ID, C.DATA_TYPE, C.DATA_LEN, C.DATA_SCAL, C.INFOTP_LNM, A.UPP_DMN_ID, D.DMN_LNM , A.SUBJ_ID, A.LST_ENTY_ID, A.LST_ENTY_PNM, A.LST_ENTY_LNM, A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD, A.CD_VAL_IVW_CD , A.DATA_FRM, A.SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN, A.CRG_USER_ID, A.DMN_ORG_DS, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS,A.ENC_YN,A.DUP_YN,A.DMN_DSCD,A.DMN_ORG_TXT,A.SUB_CD_YN , A.STND_ASRT FROM WAM_DMN A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_DMNG B ON A.DMNG_ID = B.DMNG_ID AND B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE( '9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') --AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE C ON A.INFOTP_ID = C.INFOTP_ID AND C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE( '9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_DMN D ON A.UPP_DMN_ID = D.DMN_ID --LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_SUBJ E -- ON A.SUBJ_ID = E.SUBJ_ID
WHERE A.DMN_ID IN --('OBJ_00000001173')
#{item.dmnId}
AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')

WHERE A.DMN_ID IN

UPDATE WAQ_DMN
DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMN_LNM = #{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMN_PNM = #{dmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PNM_CRI_DS = #{pnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMNG_ID = #{dmngId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMNG_LNM = #{dmngLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INFOTP_ID = #{infotpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_LEN = #{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

UPP_DMN_LNM = #{uppDmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

LST_ATTR_PNM = #{lstAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LST_ATTR_LNM = #{lstAttrLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CD_VAL_TYP_CD = #{cdValTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CD_VAL_IVW_CD = #{cdValIvwCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update WAQ_DMN set DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_LNM = #{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_PNM = #{dmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LNM_CRI_DS = #{lnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PNM_CRI_DS = #{pnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMNG_ID = #{dmngId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMNG_LNM = #{dmngLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFOTP_ID = #{infotpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_LEN = #{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DATA_SCAL = #{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INFOTP_LNM = #{infotpLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPP_DMN_ID = #{uppDmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPP_DMN_LNM = #{uppDmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MDL_LNM = #{mdlLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPP_SUBJ_LNM = #{uppSubjLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJ_ID = #{subjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJ_LNM = #{subjLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LST_ENTY_ID = #{lstEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LST_ENTY_PNM = #{lstEntyPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LST_ENTY_LNM = #{lstEntyLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CD_VAL_TYP_CD = #{cdValTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CD_VAL_IVW_CD = #{cdValIvwCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_FRM = #{dataFrm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN = #{sditmAutoCrtYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRG_USER_ID = #{crgUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRG_USER_NM = #{crgUserNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_ORG_DS = #{dmnOrgDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENC_YN = #{encYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUP_YN = #{dupYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_DSCD = #{dmnDscd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_ORG_TXT = #{dmnOrgTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_CD_YN = #{subCdYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STND_ASRT = #{stndAsrt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

UPDATE WAQ_DMN A SET (REG_TYP_CD, DMN_ID) = (SELECT CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN NULLIF(MAX(B.DMN_ID ), '') IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END , MAX(B.DMN_ID) AS DMN_ID FROM WAM_DMN B WHERE B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT -- AND B.DMN_PNM = A.DMN_PNM ) ,VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: --검증쿼리 : 등록요청 중인 표준도메인 존재....(DM021) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MSTR E INNER JOIN WAQ_DMN D ON E.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO WHERE E.RQST_NO != #{rqstNo} AND E.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT -- AND A.DMN_PNM = D.DMN_PNM AND COALESCE(D.RVW_STS_CD, '0') != '2' )
--검증쿼리 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT -- AND A.DMN_PNM = D.DMN_PNM AND A.RQST_SNO != D.RQST_SNO)
--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT -- AND A.DMN_PNM = D.DMN_PNM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U'))

--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_SYMN D WHERE A.DMN_LNM = COALESCE(D.SYMN_LNM,'_') AND A.DMN_PNM = COALESCE(D.SYMN_PNM,'_') AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') )

--검증쿼리 AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.DMN_PNM != D.DMN_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D INNER JOIN WAM_SDITM E ON D.DMN_ID = E.DMN_ID AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') WHERE D.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND D.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_SDITM F WHERE F.SDITM_LNM = E.SDITM_LNM AND F.STND_ASRT = E.STND_ASRT AND F.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) )

--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D INNER JOIN WAM_SDITM E ON D.DMN_ID = E.DMN_ID AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_SDITM F WHERE E.SDITM_LNM = F.SDITM_LNM AND E.STND_ASRT = F.STND_ASRT AND F.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_SDITM D WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND D.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAA_DMNG D WHERE A.DMNG_LNM = D.DMNG_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND D.CD_DMN_YN = 'Y') AND (NULLIF(A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD, '') IS NULL OR NULLIF(A.CD_VAL_IVW_CD, '') IS NULL)

--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAA_DMNG D WHERE A.DMNG_LNM = D.DMNG_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD')
AND D.CD_DMN_YN ='Y' ) AND A.DMN_LNM LIKE '%코드'

--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAA_DMNG D WHERE A.DMNG_LNM = D.DMNG_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') AND D.FULL_PATH LIKE '코드%') AND A.DMN_LNM NOT LIKE '%코드'
--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD = 'L' AND (NULLIF(A.LST_ENTY_PNM, '') IS NULL AND NULLIF(A.LST_ENTY_LNM, '') IS NULL )

--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NULLIF(A.LST_ENTY_PNM, '') IS NOT NULL AND NULLIF(A.LST_ENTY_LNM, '') IS NOT NULL AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL D WHERE A.LST_ENTY_PNM = D.PDM_TBL_PNM AND A.LST_ENTY_PNM = D.PDM_TBL_PNM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )

--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NULLIF(A.LST_ENTY_PNM, '') IS NOT NULL AND NULLIF(A.LST_ENTY_LNM, '') IS NOT NULL AND NULLIF(A.LST_ATTR_PNM, '') IS NOT NULL AND NULLIF(A.LST_ATTR_LNM, '') IS NOT NULL AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_COL E INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL D ON E.PDM_TBL_ID = D.PDM_TBL_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.LST_ENTY_PNM = D.PDM_TBL_PNM AND A.LST_ENTY_LNM = D.PDM_TBL_LNM AND A.LST_ATTR_PNM = E.PDM_COL_PNM AND A.LST_ATTR_LNM = E.PDM_COL_LNM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )

--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAA_DMNG D WHERE A.DMNG_LNM = D.DMNG_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND D.CD_DMN_YN = 'N') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_CD_VAL D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO AND D.RQST_DCD = 'CU' UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D INNER JOIN WAM_CD_VAL E ON E.DMN_ID = D.DMN_ID AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_CD_VAL F WHERE F.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND D.DMN_LNM = F.DMN_LNM AND D.STND_ASRT = F.STND_ASRT AND E.CD_VAL = F.CD_VAL ) )

--검증쿼리
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_CD_VAL D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO AND D.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.DATA_LEN < LENGTH(D.CD_VAL) UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D INNER JOIN WAM_CD_VAL E ON E.DMN_ID = D.DMN_ID AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.DATA_LEN < LENGTH(E.CD_VAL) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_CD_VAL F WHERE F.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND D.DMN_LNM = F.DMN_LNM AND D.STND_ASRT = F.STND_ASRT AND E.CD_VAL = F.CD_VAL ) )

--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAA_SUBJ D WHERE A.FULL_PATH = D.FULL_PATH AND D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')) AND NULLIF(A.FULL_PATH, '') IS NOT NULL

--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD_CNFG D WHERE D.BIZ_DTL_CD = #{bizDtlCd} AND A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD E WHERE D.STWD_LNM = E.STWD_LNM AND D.STWD_PNM = E.STWD_PNM AND D.STND_ASRT = E.STND_ASRT AND E.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND E.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND E.VRF_CD = '1' UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STWD E WHERE D.STWD_LNM = E.STWD_LNM AND D.STWD_PNM = E.STWD_PNM AND D.STND_ASRT = E.STND_ASRT AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD F WHERE E.STWD_LNM = F.STWD_LNM AND E.STWD_PNM = F.STWD_PNM AND E.STND_ASRT = F.STND_ASRT AND F.VRF_CD = '1' AND F.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ) )

--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAA_DMNG D INNER JOIN WAA_DMNG_INFOTP_MAP E ON D.DMNG_ID = E.DMNG_ID AND E.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') INNER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE F ON E.INFOTP_ID = F.INFOTP_ID AND F.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') WHERE A.DMNG_LNM = D.DMNG_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') AND A.INFOTP_LNM = F.INFOTP_LNM )

--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NULLIF(A.UPP_DMN_LNM, '') IS NOT NULL AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN D WHERE A.UPP_DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND D.RQST_DCD = 'CU' UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D --INNER JOIN WAM_DMN E -- ON D.DMN_ID = E.UPP_DMN_ID -- AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.UPP_DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN F WHERE D.DMN_LNM = F.DMN_LNM AND D.STND_ASRT = F.STND_ASRT AND F.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) )

--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN D WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.UPP_DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND D.RQST_DCD = 'CU' UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D INNER JOIN WAM_DMN E ON D.DMN_ID = E.UPP_DMN_ID AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN F WHERE E.DMN_LNM = F.DMN_LNM AND E.STND_ASRT = F.STND_ASRT AND F.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) )
--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.DMN_LNM != REPLACE(A.LNM_CRI_DS,';','')

--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAA_DMNG D WHERE A.DMNG_LNM = D.DMNG_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND D.CD_DMN_YN = 'Y') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.DMN_LNM != D.DMN_LNM AND A.DMN_PNM = D.DMN_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.RQST_DCD = 'CU' UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D WHERE A.DMN_LNM != D.DMN_LNM AND A.DMN_PNM = D.DMN_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN F WHERE D.DMN_LNM = F.DMN_LNM AND D.STND_ASRT = F.STND_ASRT AND F.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) )

--검증쿼리
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND LENGTH(A.DMN_PNM) > 30
--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND LENGTH(A.DMN_LNM) > 30
--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND CASE WHEN SUBSTR(COALESCE(A.DMN_PNM,'N'),1,1) BETWEEN '0' AND '9' THEN 'N' ELSE 'C' END = 'N'

--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN Z WHERE Z.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND Z.DATA_LEN != 15 AND Z.CD_VAL_TYP_CD ='O' UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN Z WHERE Z.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND Z.DATA_LEN != 25 AND Z.CD_VAL_TYP_CD ='C' )
--검증쿼리 (DM032) 단순, 복잡코드일 경우 대분류코드 필수 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD IN ('O','C') AND NULLIF(A.DMN_DSCD, '') IS NULL

--검증쿼리 (DM033) 대분류코드가 기존재할 경우 입력할 수 없음 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'C' AND A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD IN ('O','C') AND EXISTS (SELECT DMN_DSCD FROM WAM_DMN D WHERE D.DMN_DSCD IN A.DMN_DSCD AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND D.DMN_PNM !=A.DMN_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT UNION ALL SELECT DMN_DSCD FROM WAQ_DMN D WHERE D.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND D.DMN_DSCD IN A.DMN_DSCD AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND D.DMN_PNM !=A.DMN_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT )

--검증쿼리 (DM036) 대분류코드가 등록요청중일 경우 체크 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD IN ('O','C') AND EXISTS ( SELECT DMN_DSCD FROM WAQ_DMN D INNER JOIN WAQ_MSTR F ON D.RQST_NO = F.RQST_NO AND F.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' WHERE D.DMN_DSCD IN A.DMN_DSCD AND F.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )
--검증쿼리 (DM034) 대분류코드의 길이는 4 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD IN ('O','C') AND LENGTH(A.DMN_DSCD) != 4

--검증쿼리 (DM035) 대분류코드(주제영역 물리명 + 2자리) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD IN ('O','C') AND SUBSTR(A.DMN_DSCD,1,2) != 'EL' AND SUBSTR(A.DMN_DSCD,1,2) NOT IN (SELECT SUBJ_PNM FROM WAA_SUBJ WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231', 'YYYYMMDD') )
mapper.update:
UPDATE WAQ_DMN
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd} , RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts} , APRV_DTM = NOW() , APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId} ,
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND COALESCE(RVW_STS_CD, '_') != '2'

UPDATE WAQ_DMN A
RVW_STS_CD = '2' ,RVW_CONTS = '포함표준단어반려'
WHERE A.rqst_no = #{rqstNo} AND COALESCE(RVW_STS_CD,'99') != '2' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD S INNER JOIN WAQ_STWD_CNFG C on C.STWD_LNM = S.STWD_LNM and C.BIZ_DTL_CD = 'DMN' WHERE S.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND S.RVW_STS_CD = '2' and A.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO )
mapper.sql: , DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM, LNM_CRI_DS, DMNG_ID, INFOTP_ID, UPP_DMN_ID, SUBJ_ID, LST_ENTY_ID, LST_ENTY_PNM, LST_ENTY_LNM, LST_ATTR_ID, LST_ATTR_PNM, LST_ATTR_LNM, CD_VAL_TYP_CD, CD_VAL_IVW_CD , SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN, DATA_FRM, CRG_USER_ID, DMN_ORG_DS , RQST_NO , RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID , FULL_PATH , PNM_CRI_DS , ENC_YN,DUP_YN,DMN_DSCD,TRANS_YN , DMN_MAX_VAL , DMN_MIN_VAL , DMN_ORG_TXT, SUB_CD_YN , STND_ASRT
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM WAQ_DMN WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update: --WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_DMN A SET (DMN_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT B.DMN_ID AS DMN_ID , COALESCE(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , B.FRS_RQST_DTM , B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_DMN B WHERE B.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT -- AND B.DMN_PNM = A.DMN_PNM AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} --AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN B WHERE B.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT -- AND B.DMN_PNM = A.DMN_PNM AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )

UPDATE WAQ_DMN X SET UPP_DMN_ID = ( SELECT MAX(DMN_ID) from ( SELECT DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, STND_ASRT FROM WAM_DMN A WHERE 1=1 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN B WHERE A.DMN_LNM = B.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT -- AND A.DMN_PNM = B.DMN_PNM AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}) UNION ALL SELECT DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, STND_ASRT FROM WAQ_DMN A WHERE 1=1 AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} ) A WHERE A.DMN_LNM = X.UPP_DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = X.STND_ASRT ) WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND NULLIF(UPP_DMN_LNM, '') IS NOT NULL AND RVW_STS_CD = '1'

--검증쿼리 AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D INNER JOIN WAA_DMNG E ON D.DMNG_ID = E.DMNG_ID AND E.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') INNER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE F ON D.INFOTP_ID = F.INFOTP_ID AND F.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT JOIN WAM_DMN G ON D.UPP_DMN_ID = G.DMN_ID AND G.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT JOIN WAA_SUBJ H ON D.SUBJ_ID = H.SUBJ_ID AND H.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND H.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.DMN_PNM, '') , '_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(D.DMN_PNM, '') , '_') AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.DMNG_LNM, '') , '_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(E.DMNG_LNM, '') , '_') AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.INFOTP_LNM, '') , '_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(F.INFOTP_LNM, '') , '_')
AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.LNM_CRI_DS, '') , '_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(D.LNM_CRI_DS, '') , '_') AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.PNM_CRI_DS, '') , '_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(D.PNM_CRI_DS, '') , '_') AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.UPP_DMN_LNM, '') , '_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(G.DMN_LNM, '') , '_')
AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.LST_ENTY_PNM, '') , '_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(D.LST_ENTY_PNM, '') , '_') AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.LST_ENTY_LNM, '') , '_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(D.LST_ENTY_LNM, '') , '_') AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.LST_ATTR_PNM, '') , '_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(D.LST_ATTR_PNM, '') , '_') AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.LST_ATTR_LNM, '') , '_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(D.LST_ATTR_LNM, '') , '_') AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD, '') , '_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(D.CD_VAL_TYP_CD, '') , '_') AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.CD_VAL_IVW_CD, '') , '_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(D.CD_VAL_IVW_CD, '') , '_')
AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.DATA_FRM, '') , '_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(D.DATA_FRM, '') , '_') AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.CRG_USER_ID, '') , '_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(D.CRG_USER_ID, '') , '_') AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.DMN_ORG_DS, '') , '_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(D.DMN_ORG_DS, '') , '_') AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.OBJ_DESCN, '') , '_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(D.OBJ_DESCN, '') , '_') AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.ENC_YN, '') , '_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(D.ENC_YN, '') , '_') AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.DMN_DSCD, '') , '_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(D.DMN_DSCD, '') , '_') AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.DMN_MIN_VAL, '') , '_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(D.DMN_MIN_VAL, '') , '_') AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.DMN_MAX_VAL, '') , '_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(D.DMN_MAX_VAL, '') , '_') AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.DMN_ORG_TXT, '') , '_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(D.DMN_ORG_TXT, '') , '_') AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.SUB_CD_YN, '') , '_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(D.SUB_CD_YN, '') , '_')
AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_CD_VAL D WHERE D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND D.VRF_CD = '1')
mapper.delete: --WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE FROM WAM_DMN A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT -- AND B.DMN_PNM = A.DMN_PNM )
mapper.update: --WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE WAH_DMN A SET EXP_DTM = NOW() WHERE A.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT )
mapper.insert: --검증쿼리(DM031) 등록불가능한 코드값 존재 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_CD_VAL D WHERE D.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.DMN_ID = D.DMN_ID AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT AND D.VRF_CD = '2' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS E WHERE D.RQST_NO = E.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = E.RQST_SNO AND D.RQST_DTL_SNO = E.RQST_DTL_SNO AND E.VRF_DTL_CD NOT IN ('CV000')) ) AND A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD IN ('O', 'C')

--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD = 'O' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN D WHERE D.CD_VAL_TYP_CD = 'O' AND D.DMN_ID = A.UPP_DMN_ID AND LEVEL >= 3 AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') START WITH NULLIF(D.UPP_DMN_ID, '') IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR D.DMN_ID = D.UPP_DMN_ID )

INSERT INTO WAQ_DMN( RQST_NO ,RQST_SNO ,DMN_ID ,DMN_LNM ,DMN_PNM ,LNM_CRI_DS ,RQST_DCD ,RVW_STS_CD ,RVW_CONTS ,VRF_CD ,VRF_RMK ,DMNG_ID ,DMNG_LNM ,INFOTP_ID ,DATA_TYPE ,DATA_LEN ,DATA_SCAL ,INFOTP_LNM ,UPP_DMN_ID ,UPP_DMN_LNM ,MDL_LNM ,UPP_SUBJ_LNM ,SUBJ_ID ,SUBJ_LNM ,LST_ENTY_ID ,LST_ENTY_PNM ,LST_ENTY_LNM ,LST_ATTR_ID ,LST_ATTR_PNM ,LST_ATTR_LNM ,CD_VAL_TYP_CD ,CD_VAL_IVW_CD ,DATA_FRM ,SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN ,CRG_USER_ID ,CRG_USER_NM ,DMN_ORG_DS ,OBJ_DESCN ,OBJ_VERS ,REG_TYP_CD ,FRS_RQST_DTM ,FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,RQST_DTM ,RQST_USER_ID ,APRV_DTM ,APRV_USER_ID ,FULL_PATH ,PNM_CRI_DS ,ENC_YN ,DMN_DSCD ,DMN_ORG_TXT ,SUB_CD_YN ,STND_ASRT ) SELECT #{reqmst.rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,RQST_SNO ,DMN_ID ,DMN_LNM ,DMN_PNM ,LNM_CRI_DS ,RQST_DCD ,'0' ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,DMNG_ID ,DMNG_LNM ,INFOTP_ID ,DATA_TYPE ,DATA_LEN ,DATA_SCAL ,INFOTP_LNM ,UPP_DMN_ID ,UPP_DMN_LNM ,MDL_LNM ,UPP_SUBJ_LNM ,SUBJ_ID ,SUBJ_LNM ,LST_ENTY_ID ,LST_ENTY_PNM ,LST_ENTY_LNM ,LST_ATTR_ID ,LST_ATTR_PNM ,LST_ATTR_LNM ,CD_VAL_TYP_CD ,CD_VAL_IVW_CD ,DATA_FRM ,SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN ,CRG_USER_ID ,CRG_USER_NM ,DMN_ORG_DS ,OBJ_DESCN ,OBJ_VERS ,REG_TYP_CD ,FRS_RQST_DTM ,FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,RQST_DTM ,RQST_USER_ID ,NULL ,NULL ,FULL_PATH ,PNM_CRI_DS ,ENC_YN ,DMN_DSCD ,DMN_ORG_TXT ,SUB_CD_YN ,STND_ASRT FROM WAQ_DMN A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{oldRqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '2'
mapper.update: UPDATE WAM_SDITM Z SET INFOTP_ID = (SELECT A.INFOTP_ID FROM WAQ_DMN A INNER JOIN WAM_DMN B ON A.DMN_ID = B.DMN_ID AND A.INFOTP_ID != B.INFOTP_ID INNER JOIN V_WAA_DMNG C ON C.DMNG_ID = B.DMNG_ID WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND C.DMNG_LNM = '코드' AND B.DMN_ID = Z.DMN_ID ) WHERE EXISTS (SELECT A.INFOTP_ID FROM WAQ_DMN A INNER JOIN WAM_DMN B ON A.DMN_ID = B.DMN_ID AND A.INFOTP_ID != B.INFOTP_ID INNER JOIN V_WAA_DMNG C ON C.DMNG_ID = B.DMNG_ID WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND C.DMNG_LNM = '코드' AND B.DMN_ID = Z.DMN_ID )

UPDATE WAH_SDITM Z SET INFOTP_ID = (SELECT A.INFOTP_ID from WAQ_dmn A inner join WAM_dmn B on A.dmn_id = B.dmn_id and A.INFOTP_ID != B.INFOTP_ID where A.rqst_no = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND Z.DMN_ID = B.DMN_ID ) WHERE EXISTS (SELECT A.INFOTP_ID from WAQ_dmn A inner join WAM_dmn B on A.dmn_id = B.dmn_id and a.INFOTP_ID != b.INFOTP_ID where A.rqst_no = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND Z.DMN_ID = B.DMN_ID AND Z.INFOTP_ID = B.INFOTP_ID ) AND Z.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231', 'YYYYMMDD') AND Z.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
--검증쿼리(도메인 신규 신청시 용어 자동신청이 체크되면 동일한 이름의 용어가 존재하는지 체크) and A.REG_TYP_CD = 'C' AND A.SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN ='Y' AND A.DMN_PNM IN (SELECT Z.SDITM_PNM FROM WAM_SDITM Z WHERE A.STND_ASRT = Z.STND_ASRT )

UPDATE WAH_DMN A SET TRANS_YN = (SELECT COALESCE(B.TRANS_YN, 'N') FROM WAH_DMN B WHERE A.DMN_ID = B.DMN_ID AND (A.OBJ_VERS-1) = B.OBJ_VERS AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD')

UPDATE WAQ_SDITM A SET RVW_STS_CD = '2' WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN B WHERE B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND B.REG_TYP_CD = 'C' AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '2' )

UPDATE WAQ_DMN A SET RVW_STS_CD = '2' WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD_CNFG B INNER JOIN WAQ_STWD C ON C.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND C.STWD_LNM = B.STWD_LNM AND C.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT AND C.REG_TYP_CD = 'C' AND C.RVW_STS_CD = '2' WHERE B.BIZ_DTL_CD = 'DMN' AND B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO )

UPDATE WAQ_DMN A SET ( DMN_PNM, LNM_CRI_DS, DMNG_ID, DMNG_LNM, INFOTP_ID, INFOTP_LNM, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL , UPP_DMN_ID, SUBJ_ID, LST_ENTY_ID, LST_ENTY_PNM, LST_ENTY_LNM, LST_ATTR_ID, LST_ATTR_PNM, LST_ATTR_LNM , CD_VAL_TYP_CD, CD_VAL_IVW_CD, SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN, DATA_FRM, CRG_USER_ID, DMN_ORG_DS , OBJ_DESCN, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID , FULL_PATH, PNM_CRI_DS, ENC_YN, DMN_DSCD, TRANS_YN, DMN_ORG_TXT,SUB_CD_YN) = (SELECT B.DMN_PNM, B.LNM_CRI_DS, B.DMNG_ID, D.DMNG_LNM, B.INFOTP_ID , C.INFOTP_LNM, C.DATA_TYPE, C.DATA_LEN, C.DATA_SCAL , B.UPP_DMN_ID, B.SUBJ_ID, B.LST_ENTY_ID, B.LST_ENTY_PNM, B.LST_ENTY_LNM, B.LST_ATTR_ID, B.LST_ATTR_PNM, B.LST_ATTR_LNM , B.CD_VAL_TYP_CD, B.CD_VAL_IVW_CD, B.SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN, B.DATA_FRM, B.CRG_USER_ID, B.DMN_ORG_DS , B.OBJ_DESCN , B.FRS_RQST_DTM , B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID , B.FULL_PATH, B.PNM_CRI_DS, ENC_YN, B.DMN_DSCD, B.TRANS_YN, B.DMN_ORG_TXT,B.SUB_CD_YN FROM WAM_DMN B INNER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE C ON C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND C.INFOTP_ID = B.INFOTP_ID INNER JOIN V_WAA_DMNG D ON D.DMNG_ID = B.DMNG_ID WHERE B.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'D' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DMN B WHERE B.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WAQ_DMN ( RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM , LNM_CRI_DS , PNM_CRI_DS , RQST_DCD, DMNG_ID, DMNG_LNM , INFOTP_ID, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, INFOTP_LNM, UPP_DMN_ID, UPP_DMN_LNM , SUBJ_ID, LST_ENTY_ID, LST_ENTY_PNM, LST_ENTY_LNM, CD_VAL_TYP_CD, CD_VAL_IVW_CD , DATA_FRM, SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN, CRG_USER_ID, DMN_ORG_DS, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS,ENC_YN,DMN_DSCD, FULL_PATH,DMN_ORG_TXT,SUB_CD_YN,STND_ASRT ) SELECT #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) FROM WAQ_DMN WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) + (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) , A.DMN_ID, A.DMN_LNM, A.DMN_PNM , A.LNM_CRI_DS , A.PNM_CRI_DS , 'CU', A.DMNG_ID, B.DMNG_LNM , A.INFOTP_ID, C.DATA_TYPE, C.DATA_LEN, C.DATA_SCAL, C.INFOTP_LNM, A.UPP_DMN_ID, D.DMN_LNM , A.SUBJ_ID, A.LST_ENTY_ID, A.LST_ENTY_PNM, A.LST_ENTY_LNM, A.CD_VAL_TYP_CD, A.CD_VAL_IVW_CD , A.DATA_FRM, A.SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN, A.CRG_USER_ID, A.DMN_ORG_DS, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS,A.ENC_YN,A.DMN_DSCD, A.FULL_PATH, A.DMN_ORG_TXT,A.SUB_CD_YN , A.STND_ASRT FROM WAM_DMN A LEFT JOIN WAA_DMNG B ON B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE( '9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND B.DMNG_ID = A.DMNG_ID LEFT JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE C ON C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE( '9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND C.INFOTP_ID = A.INFOTP_ID LEFT JOIN WAM_DMN D ON D.DMN_ID = A.UPP_DMN_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.DMN_LNM = #{dmnLnm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.STND_ASRT = #{stndAsrt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DMN X WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND X.DMN_LNM = #{dmnLnm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND x.STND_ASRT = #{stndAsrt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND REGEXP_COUNT(A.LNM_CRI_DS,';') != REGEXP_COUNT(A.PNM_CRI_DS,';')
mapper.update: UPDATE WAQ_DMN A SET (DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL) = (SELECT B.DATA_TYPE, B.DATA_LEN, B.DATA_SCAL FROM WAA_INFO_TYPE B WHERE B.INFOTP_LNM = A.INFOTP_LNM AND B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT) WHERE A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NULLIF(A.INFOTP_LNM, '') IS NOT NULL AND NULLIF(A.DATA_TYPE, '') IS NULL AND A.DATA_LEN IS NULL AND A.DATA_SCAL IS NULL
UPDATE WAQ_DMN A SET SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN = 'N' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NULLIF(A.SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN, '') IS NULL
